pkgmetadata.longdescription: ShortLoop creates and updates API Collections by sampling traffic in your web application with no performance or memory overhead. We offer SDK for multiple languages and frameworks.`shortloop-python` provides support for python web frameworks.## CompatibilityPython: >= 3.7| Web Framework | Version ||---------------|---------|| Django | \>= 3.2 |## UsageFor usage, refer [Documentation](https://docs.shortloop.dev)
